the run of the mill everyday student, but also good for struggling high sch. students

South campus seems to be the nicest campus. It actually feels like a college campus, not a high school repurposed.

Erie community college -south is a nice campus, with excellent staff. I really like that they offer extensive help for struggling students, English, math , science study labs-with tutoring staff . .They also offer free shuttles between campuses.
pageTitle: Erie Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

What to do for fun absolutely nothing Food and Dining horrible Dorm Life there isnt one Academic Rigor it is not that great Tips for prospective students its good for general studies. you should probably attend a different school than ecc In three sentences it is alright. some professors are good. and some are not Login to rate or flag the reviews ROBIN from Buffalo, NY
